section.p: Your last blow cleaves the ghostly apparition in two, and it dissipates into the dark. You proceed onward down the tunnel. But then you spot the spectre reforming in the air! It swoops to attack again, with an unearthly howl. This time, it stronger than before.

p.fightdamage:
Each time you are wounded by the spectre, .
If you fail the roll, the sword
drains you of one COMBAT point
.
If you make the roll, you resist the COMBAT drain.
